subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] '469 availability

Hi Frank,
 
I know I have offered before but you haven't responded.  Your wife  can't 
complain if people donate to your research could she?  You have done  so much for 
this field that some people should be allowed to donate to you  without 
expecting anything in return.  What do you think?
 
Jeff
